sprite.name: Background Model Animation (CHR) Player
sprite.notes: Plays a CHR animation on the current background.
sprite.advancednotes: CHR animations are set up by animating bone movement (translation, rotation, or scaling). This is the most commonly used format in NSMBW, underpinning most 3D animation.

dualbox.title1: Triggers when Event ID is On
dualbox.title2: Triggers when Event ID is Off
dualbox.comment: Triggers when the triggering event ID is activated or deactivated.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 1
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 2
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 3
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Play an Animation after the First One is Done

list.title: Next Animation Name (Loop)
list.comment:
This animation will be played at the end of the first one.
This animation will loop.

sprite.name: Background Texture Animation (SRT) Player
sprite.notes: Plays a SRT animation on the current background.
sprite.advancednotes: SRT animations are set up by animating texture transforms (translation, rotation, or scaling). This is used in NSMBW for effects such as moving water and clouds.

dualbox.title1: Triggers when Event ID is On
dualbox.title2: Triggers when Event ID is Off
dualbox.comment: Triggers when the triggering event ID is activated or deactivated.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 1
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 2
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 3
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Play an Animation after the First One is Done

list.title: Next Animation Name (Loop)
list.comment:
This animation will be played at the end of the first one.
This animation will loop.

sprite.name: Background Texture Pattern (PAT) Player
sprite.notes: Plays a PAT animation on the current background.
sprite.advancednotes: PAT animations are set up by animating textures. This is used in NSMBW for effects such as changing power-up outfits and facial expressions.

dualbox.title1: Triggers when Event ID is On
dualbox.title2: Triggers when Event ID is Off
dualbox.comment: Triggers when the triggering event ID is activated or deactivated.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 1
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 2
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 3
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Play an Animation after the First One is Done

list.title: Next Animation Name (Loop)
list.comment:
This animation will be played at the end of the first one.
This animation will loop.

sprite.name: Background Visibility Sequence (VIS) Player
sprite.notes: Plays a VIS animation on the current background.
sprite.advancednotes: VIS animations are set up by animating the visibility of bones. This is used in NSMBW for effects such as the clown car's varying 3D facial expressions.

dualbox.title1: Triggers when Event ID is On
dualbox.title2: Triggers when Event ID is Off
dualbox.comment: Triggers when the triggering event ID is activated or deactivated.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 1
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 2
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 3
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Play an Animation after the First One is Done

list.title: Next Animation Name (Loop)
list.comment:
This animation will be played at the end of the first one.
This animation will loop.

sprite.name: Background Color Sequence (CLR) Player
sprite.notes: Plays a CLR animation on the current background.
sprite.advancednotes: CLR animations are set up by animating the contents of certain color registers. These include the registers in lighting channels and the standard & constant registers on every material. This is used in NSMBW for effects such as bosses flashing red when they take damage.

dualbox.title1: Triggers when Event ID is On
dualbox.title2: Triggers when Event ID is Off
dualbox.comment: Triggers when the triggering event ID is activated or deactivated.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 1
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 2
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Background Slot 3
checkbox.comment: Slot number from top to bottom.

checkbox.title: Play an Animation after the First One is Done

list.title: Next Animation Name (Loop)
list.comment:
This animation will be played at the end of the first one.
This animation will loop.
